channel.title: Beckett on The Condition of the Republic
channel.description: Recent content in Beckett on The Condition of the Republic

item.title: Dylan Moran's Radio Play, Flann O'Brien and Samuel Beckett
item.description: I’ve been a fan of Dylan Moran’s stand-up for as far back as I can remember, since I saw his first stand-up special Monster. I think I was about twelve, and Moran’s misanthropic and depressive whimsy got lodged deep into my world view, and influenced me to try stand-up the few times that I did, aswell as slur the way I speak infinitesimally. I’m not sure if the way I speak now is my actual voice.
